subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kyle Korver hit a long 3-pointer with 1.9 seconds remaining in overtime, and the Atlanta Hawks beat Washington, 101-100, extending the Wizards’ franchise-worst start to 0-10.
snippet: Kyle Korver hit a long 3-pointer with 1.9 seconds remaining in overtime, and the Atlanta Hawks beat Washington, 101-100, extending the Wizards’ franchise-worst start to 0-10.
